repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: V Raghavan provided catalog information, written in black ink pen on the paper : Śāstradīpikā mimāṃsā pārthasārathimiśra Granth ca??au 300p 17L . It is a mimāṃsā text.

msItem.title: Śāstradīpikā
msItem.author: pārthasārathimiśra
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 …. (A few syllables are broken) ptya pakṣavādipra(karaṇa)ntareṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate . bhavedadhya (after this half of the line is chopped due to folio edge broken.)
msItem.explicit: xv 10 dham … madhyetantraṃ yasya yeṣāṃ vidhānaṃ te (gap 2 syllables due to broken folio) kto mukhyatantraprasaṅgaḥ .. jijñāso yat dharma uktaḥ caturdhā sa prajñāto dharmmalakṣaṇairdvādaśāntaiḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: xv 10 (iti śrī mahāmahopādhyāya pārthasārathimiśra) xv 11 viracitāyāṃ śastradīpikāyāṃ dvādasaśyādhyāyasya (gap 3 syllables due to broken folio) pādaḥ samāptaścādhyayaḥ .. iti samāptā śāstradīpikā …. śrī mahāgaṇapataye namaḥ xv 12 śrīgurucaraṇāravindasya namaḥ śrīmahāgaṇapaye namaḥ

supportDesc.foliation: folio numbers are lost as the margins are broken.

handNote.desc: written in very small characters. Some letters are unclear due to old folio.

listBibl.bibl:
The Śāstradīpikā with the commentary Mayukhamālikā by Samanātha (from second pāda of first chapter till the end ) and with the commentary yuktisnehaprapuraṇī with gūḍhārthavivaraṇa by Ramakrishna (for the first tarkapāda ) Edi by Dharmadattasuri, Pub; Tukarama Jivaji, The Nirnaysagar press. Bombay 1915.
Available on archive org.

encodingDesc.p: Spapces are added to separate words. Round brackets are used to show supplied text.

TEI.text:
1v 1 …. (A few syllables are broken) ptya pakṣavādipra(karaṇa)ntareṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate . bhavedadhya (after this half of the line is chopped due to folio edge broken.)
xv 10 dham … madhyetantraṃ yasya yeṣāṃ vidhānaṃ te (gap 2 syllables due to broken folio) kto mukhyatantraprasaṅgaḥ .. jijñāso yat dharma uktaḥ caturdhā sa prajñāto dharmmalakṣaṇairdvādaśāntaiḥ .. (iti śrī mahāmahopādhyāya pārthasārathimiśra) xv 11 viracitāyāṃ śastradīpikāyāṃ dvādasaśyādhyāyasya (gap 3 syllables due to broken folio) pādaḥ samāptaścādhyayaḥ .. iti samāptā śāstradīpikā …. śrī mahāgaṇapataye namaḥ xv 12 śrīgurucaraṇāravindasya namaḥ śrīmahāgaṇapaye namaḥ
